profile.title: Who am I ?
profile.presentation:
# Welcome :D 

My name is Quentin GRISEL, a young React/C# fullstack developer.

Coming out from an IT & network oriented school formation, I took another path as developer because this is the thing that gives me most satisfaction. Here is the reason why i started developping at the age of 14 ! It gives me pleasure so why not ? :) 

I mainly master /react/ and /csharp/.

timeline.august2019:
## August 2019 - Self training on React

*   Hooks (React 16.8)
*   Context Api (Stable since React 16.3)
*   Teamwork magic ([Through this article](https://medium.com/simply/state-management-with-react-hooks-and-context-api-at-10-lines-of-code-baf6be8302c))
timeline.2019:
## 2019 - FullStack development

*   Angular : Major and minor evolutions, bug fixes
*   C# : Major and minor evolutions, bug fixes
timeline.2018:
## 2018 - FullStack development

*   Angular : First step, minor evolutions, bug fixes
*   React :
    *   Creation of a training exercices management plateform (KATA & DOJO)
    *   Creation of a POC (Proof Of Concept) about React. Purpose : propose React as a viable and functional technology for the client's needs
    *   Creation of a complete formation project, from environnement to Redux
*   C# :
    *   Creation of training exercices management APIs (ONION architecture)
    *   Major evolutions on differents subjects
*   Social : Participation in presentations about multiple technical subjects related to development and software architecture
*   Divers :
    *   Pr√©sentations/Formations (30 minutes format) on various subjects (technological watch, discovering, etc.)
    *   Technical conceptions writing
timeline.2017:
## 2017 - Full time job at Capgemini

*   C# : Formation and apprenticeship (.NET framework, ASP.NET, Razor)
*   Learning few Front-End development tools : Node.js, Git (Gitflow)
